attributes.action: Stop MPs pay until Brexit is sorted
attributes.background: Members of Parliament failed in their duty to the electorate.  The way that Brexit has been handled by all factions has made the UK a laughing stock.  If they worked in any other industry they would have been fired but as that is not possible their pay should be stopped until they sort out Brexit.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
